page.title: 06Shops In Wickham Bishops
page.content: The shops in Wickham Bishops consist of : At Snow's Corner a greengrocers and offlicense, carpet shops & Estate Agents. Further along Poney & Goulds, Peggoty's (general store), Salon Exclusive (hair & clothes) Sizers, Jarmains & a Kitchen shop. Poney & Goulds is a family business selling general goods, plus a bakery, providing its own bread and cakes baked on the premises. Sizers the butchers is a family business which began in 1966. Mr Sizer has the meat delivered from Ipswich Pearly's and Great Heighs. Jarmains is the local newsagents and post office. Besides newspapers he sells sweets, toys, stationary, small gifts and cards. Best sellers are the Beano and Mars Bars.
